attributes.action: arrange for Stockport Metropolitan Borough Council to erect of life size statue of Gaz Butler in Stockport town centre.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition will recognise the support of a life size bronze statue of Gaz Butler the legendary Marple College goer in Stockport town centre. Preferenbly on the nice little plaza bit between the end of Merseyway and the bus station. It should have a caption that reads "I DONT EVEN SPEAK LIKE THAT".

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
